inputs.where:
@and(
    equals(item()?['from']?['role'], 'bot'),
    greaterOrEquals(item()?['timestamp'], outputs('Compose:_CurrentTimestamp')),
    empty(first(item()?['attachments'])?['content']?['tokenExchangeResource']?['id']),
    or(
        equals(first(item()?['attachments'])?['contentType'], 'application/vnd.microsoft.card.adaptive'),
        and(
            not(empty(item()?['text'])), 
            not(
                or(
                    contains(toLower(item()?['text']), 'need you to sign in'),
                    contains(toLower(item()?['text']), 'please sign in'),
                    contains(toLower(item()?['text']), 'sign in to continue'),
                    contains(toLower(item()?['text']), 'log in to access'),
                    contains(toLower(item()?['text']), 'sign-in required'),
                    contains(toLower(item()?['text']), 'click here to log in')
                )
            )
        )
    )
)

inputs.name: MultiTurnResult

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch>
    <entity name="cat_copilottest">
        <attribute name="cat_name"/>
        <attribute name="cat_adaptivecardpayload"/>
        <attribute name="cat_testutterance"/>
        <attribute name="cat_copilottestid"/>
        <attribute name="cat_expectedresponse"/>
        <attribute name="cat_testtypecode"/>
        <attribute name="cat_generativeansweroutcomecode"/>
        <attribute name="cat_expectedpositionoftheresponseactivity"/>
        <attribute name="cat_expectedtopicname"/>
        <attribute name="cat_isstartconversationeventsent"/>
        <attribute name="cat_externalvariablesjson"/>
        <attribute name="cat_expectedattachmentsjson"/>
        <attribute name="cat_validationinstructions"/>
        <attribute name="cat_secondsbeforegettinganswer"/>
        <attribute name="cat_critical"/>
        <attribute name="cat_operationtypecode"/>
        <attribute name="cat_comparisonoperator"/>
        <attribute name="cat_expectedtools"/>
        <attribute name="cat_passthreshold"/>
         <order attribute="cat_order" descending="false"/>
        <filter type="and">
            <condition attribute="cat_copilottestsetid" operator="eq" value="@{triggerBody()['text_1']}" />
            <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
            <condition attribute="cat_parent" operator="eq" value="@{triggerBody()['text_2']}" />
           <condition attribute="cat_testtypecode" operator="ne" value="5" />
        </filter>
    </entity>
</fetch>
